Package com.app.osgrim

Provides the activities, fragments and adapter to display and associate actions to the Osgrim elements.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BooleanVariable.ChangeListener
    The ChangeListener interface.
    OnItemClickListener
    Interface OnItemClickListener implemented by the InputFragment and indicated in the ReportAdapter so that when a user click on a report in the list of reports, the report opens itself in the report input tab.

    Class Description

    BooleanVariable class.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.

    IncidentAdapter class.
    InputFragment
    The InputFragment class is the view of the report input.
    IntervenantAdapter
    IntervenantAdapter class.
    ListFragment
    ListFragment class.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class is the first class being executed.
    PageAdapter
    PageAdapter class allows us to associate the three fragments (list, input and export) to the three tabs.

    ServiceAdapter class.

Package com.app.osgrim Description

Provides the activities, fragments and adapter to display and associate actions to the Osgrim elements. MainActivity, ListFragment, InputFragment and ExportFragment handle what the user sees on the screen and how it interacts with him. The IncidentAdapter, IntervenantAdapter, ReportAdapter and ServiceAdapter are in charge of the link between a list of data and its displaying on a list component (RecyclerView).
Fournit les activités, fragments et adaptateurs pour afficher et associer des actions aux éléments d'Osgrim. MainActivity, ListFragment, InputFragment et ExportFragment gèrent ce que l'utilisateur voit sur l'écran et comment cela intéragit avec lui. L'IncidentAdapter, IntervenantAdapter, ReportAdapter et ServiceAdapter sont en charge du lien entre une liste de données et son affichage sur un composant liste (RecyclerView).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Morgane Cadeau
